text:
@SecPompeo From the concealment of #coronavirus to the suppression of freedom in many places, the world has finally realised China is a threat to the free world.

It’s time to restore the int’l order. #DecoupleChina #StandwithHongKong https://t.co/HLu4pgWPNX
